title: Mutter
text: I led the development of the website for Mutter, a Spanish company that creates innovative startups with great potential for investors. Our team of over 10 people worked tirelessly to deliver a modern and impactful website, complete with captivating animations and custom designs.
Using WordPress and a significant amount of custom code, we were able to create dynamic and multilingual content that truly showcases the unique and cutting-edge work that Mutter does.
It was an exciting project, and it was incredibly rewarding to see the finished product come together.
